content: अदोष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Free from faults, demerits, vices, or defects &c.; innocent; जायामदोषामुत संत्यजामि <ls>R. 14. 34.</ls> {@--2@} Free from the faults of composition, such as अश्लीलता, ग्राम्यता &c., See दोष; अदोषौ शब्दार्थौ <ls>K. P. 1</ls>; अदोषं गुणवत् काव्यं <ls>Sar. K. 1.</ls> --षः Not a fault; किमित्यदोषेण तिरस्कृता वयं <ls>Ki. 14. 11</ls> though not at fault.
